fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a Player to infuse every full moon night.
- There are 3 types of infusions that can be cast on a Player:
> **Arcane Armor:** The targeted player receives Powerful Defence while infused, if the player is attacked and saved by the Armor, the Armor is destroyed.
>
> **Mystical Strength:** The targeted player gains a Powerful Attack while infused, even if their role does not have an attack. If the player attacks another player with this Infusion, the strength fades.
>
> **Winding Speed:** The targeted player gains another action to perform their abilities at night, this Infusion can only be cast once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can speak with the other Adventurers at night.
- You can only have one Infusion active at a time.
- Your Infusions die with you.
- You may only Infuse yourself once.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Adventurers.
